name: Median income single filer
description: Single person earning €50,000 - typical middle-income scenario

sources.description: Calculated using official 2024 Belastingdienst rates and tax credits
sources.notes: Tax: €18,485, General credit phased out to €1,692.24, Labour credit: €4,878.10 (verified from official arbeidskorting table), Total credits: €6,570.34, Net tax: €11,914.66, Net ≈ €38,085
